resources.string: Please press the plus button to add additional videos
Be the first to hear about new publications from Leo Bigger.

Leo Bigger and his wife Susanna are the Senior Pastors of ICF Zurich, a church with a weekly attendance of 3\'200 people in 7 different locations. Leo and two other pastors founded ICF Zurich In 1996. Together they have realized the dream of building «a Church at the heartbeat of time»
The developer kitchen are five friends from ICF Zurich. They desire is to stay digitally on the cutting edge by realizing projects. Projects like this app.

ICF (International Christian Fellowship) is a non-denominational church with a biblical foundation that was birthed out of the vision to build a dynamic, tangible church that is right at the heartbeat of time.
